content.description: The graphical user interface of the Peakboard Hub on premise has been extensively revised in many areas.

list_items: [Peakboard Boxes](/hub/Peakboard_Hub_on_premise/en-hub_boxmanagement.html) - Added search bar for Peakboard Boxes
[Peakboard Boxes](/hub/Peakboard_Hub_on_premise/en-hub_boxmanagement.html) - Improved manual addition of a Peakboard Box update file to the Peakboard Hub
[Lists](/hub/Lists/en-hub_new-list.html) - Fixed issues with umlauts in CSV list exports
[Lists](/hub/Lists/en-hub_new-list.html) - Fixed sorting issue when adding a new row to a list
[Lists](/hub/Lists/en-hub_new-list.html) - Added possibility to sort lists by multiple columns
[Lists](/hub/Lists/en-hub_new-list.html) - Added default values for columns when adding a new row
[Users](/hub/Peakboard_Hub_on_premise/en-hub_usermanagement.html) - Added user group based permissions for lists
[Users](/hub/Peakboard_Hub_on_premise/en-hub_usermanagement.html) - Added ability for users to delete themselves
Fixed issue with the use of ';' in the Peakboard Hub database connection password
Various UI updates (general appearance, some pop-ups, sidebar, Peakboard Box overview, login, some labels changed)
